Blog.post: ToDAy is a very special day for iR...Its iR's bday..!!! pit aru ingat nak bagi present pagi2...tapi bcoz of my bro..terlambat ar..then meet iR in school jer...then during my pe lesson..iR dtng berbual jap...dia senyum2...hahah...cute...then recess time..tunggu iR dia tak muncul2...haiya...biler su tanyer pit bagi iR aper aru dia muncul...then pit ingat aru nak bagi present pat atas...skali ROMEO HITAM..da naik dulu ar..asyik potong jln ar ditu..heheh...main belon ar...takpe pit bagi chance...then pit pinjam hp su..sms iR jap..then terus lepas skool..pit jumpe iR pat luar kelas iR...pit bagi dia present tu..iR ckp thank u bynk2..dia senyum sana...senyum sini...hahah.....cair ar...kekeke....manis..tapi pit lagi manis...hahaha.....then pit tunggu dia abis "gelek"heheh..workout la...benda aces day tu...then duduk2 ngan dia pat porch..heheh...berbual2...besh....then alik...kiter sempat ambik gmbr kucing pat kedai bunga..heheh...kucing tu gemok sey...mcm pit...cute giler nyer...heheh...its a gd thing...iR and me love cats..heheh...besh....nanti pit nak ajak iR g tgok cat...ngan mcm2 ar...puppies,rabbits,fish...the animals there..are so beautiful...im sure...iR gonna love it...(",) K gtg...see yazz....love u always...!!

Life is Nothing without you... The World is showing its Iniquity... Redemption take over my Life every single day.. I embrace myself to find peace within.. But i feel so helpless.. Please dont leave me....Its so dark in here I cant breathe...what art thou to do this torture... Hiding in youre Masquarade..

oN SaTUrDAY...when TO skool..wif S.A.M...and Liana uat dnt...then go study with iR and tirah...i was left alone from 3+ to 4+ sey..heheh..iR got to go home..ader masalah terbesar..kekek..ThEN iR and me go cozwey carik buku kat kedai aper tah..then g mkn kat kedai kopi kat umah fida..heheh...iR kelakar sey...iR tanyer pit nak mkn per...pit ckp tak tahu...bis dia kater sebat ar...bis pit pekik" oi!! sebat ar" iR ketawa...cute ar..heheh..then beli air...iR flirt ngan apek...heheheh...iR panggil apek tu abg..heheh..TAKLEH TASHAN..HEHEH...pit yg sengaja suruh dia panggil apek tu abg..nasib apek tak dgr..heheheh...kiter duduk2 berbual...besh...kla...pit gtg...nitezzz....

Hi..i didnt go to skool today...im having a fever n flu...and a sore throat..im kinda not in a mood...because of wat happen yesterday...i was happy to sms iR yest...but bcoz of that asShole..i was pissed off...he asked iR...have iR kiss anyone before...or has anyone kiss iR before...iR said both..and he asked izzit a guy or a gerl...iR said both..then he ask iR...who's the gerl..and iR said me...n he was shocked and he tot we were LEs...wAt the FARk!! izzit so wrong..for me to kiss iR??? iTs not like i do it everyday....its only on some ocassions...if iR is feeling down i'll give iR a peck..when iR is sick...i'll give iR a peck....wats so wrong bout that??? why is he jumping to conclusion??? Stupid sia..he can say watever he wants...i dun give a damn.......i LoVe iR as my sister.....it never cross my mind to Love iR more than that...haizz....k la...i gtg...BYEZZ.....

SUndays is always the best...early as 9+ i already wake up and get ready to go for my religious class....finish the whole lesson around 12.30...then i have my lunch eating chicken porridge...YuMmM..2day quite mendak..bcoz my mummy is not around..she went to work...im not feeling well again...my voice becoming more deeper...haizz....prelim coming sia..ader jer yg tak kena...btw i chat wif iR earlier...iR doing the f&n work..dia bz...so now..im juz surfing the net n watching tv at the same time at my aunt's house...2morow is monday..confirm bluesss....every monday boringzz...lagi2 kalau ader assembly...btw..miss iR soo MUch...wanna go out wif iR for a movie pleasure..n mayb take iR to esplanade..heheh....after the common test i think...bubbyezz..!!!!muackzz!!

..its been awhile since i update this blog of mine...my life has been great with iR by my side...(",) iR have always been then for me...showered me with love,care,laughters of joy and tears...things change since the june holidays...after we kinda fought...i think it over every day & night..thinking bout wat i said...tat makes iR's heart shatter...i was on the verge of anger at that moment..i confess..of all this years being wif iR..Tats the first time that i was really piss off...couldnt imagine how it even started...i didnt mean to put it in a negative way...i say what i have to say to make things clear...but iR take it deep into iR's heart..that maybe i made iR "cry" not physically mayb...but emotionally...after what happen...i hated myself..for making iR feel so down...from there...i began to tell myself to change n be a better person for iR...be more understanding...loving...caring...n all sorts of stuff...i push myself to throw my attitude..and after that...things really start to change..i find myself..being very open wif iR...and iR and i are really getting along pretty well...i love it...it was a major change for me...i find myself loving iR more & more each day...Recently..i got to admit...iR was very cute...hehehe....LoVe iT whEN I GOT to spent time wif iR...seeing that sweet smile on iR's face..juz makes my day..(",) so far the promise that i've kept to myself..is really going somewhere.. i promise..i would take good care of iR...love iR as long as im alive..be there for iR no matter what..and never to make iR shed a tear...i will keep to that promise...hold on to it as time goes by...LoVe iR sOO much..that i cant explain how...i cherish the friendship we had...that i cant bare to watch iR walk away leaving me..with all the memories we shared....really looking forward to spent quality time together wif iR after iR's Common test next week...juz before my n levels start...im gonna give iR a suprise...(",) i gtg now...BuBbYeZZ... sHe'S The BeST siStEr in The WOrLd!!!!!!!!!!

BabY i LoVe U.. AnD i'LL neVeR LeT yOu GO.. BuT iF i HAvE to.. I thiNk THat YoU shOuLd KnoW.. aLL THe LOvE wE MaDe CaN neVeR BE eRasE... AnD I pRoMiSe YoU..ThAt YoU WiLL neVeR be RepLaCe.. I LoVe YoU.. yEs i Do.. I'LL be WiF u AS LonG as U wALk mE thRouGH.. UnTiL THe eND oF TimE.. FrOm THe DaY i mEt U..i KnOw We'LL Be ToGeTHEr.. AnD nOw I kNOw I Wana Be WiF U FoReVeR.. I CaN SaY Im TRuLy HaPPy To DispLay U MaDe Me THinK THaT I LiVe My LiFe eVeRyDaY THeRE'S nEvEr BeeN No DoUbT iN My MinD THaT I ReGReT EveR HaVinG U By My SiDE BuT iF thE daY comEs THat I haVe TO LeT u gO.. I tHiNk THaT thErE's SuMtiNg I shOuLd PRoBaBLy LeT u KnOW ThAT EveRyDay ThaT i SPenD wiF u.. i WiLL MiSs U COz iM hApPy THaT i HaVe u Wif mE aLL tHis WhiLe..

hi.....today is just suckier then ever...had a long talk with mik after skool...i pour out everything that i have to say to make things clear...i was very frank wif him...takde sembunyi2...he accepted wat i said...n he was sori..he said i have the right to get angry over wat happen...so wat the heck...i throw everything rite back at him...i mean wif words ukan ngan barang..kekekek...so farking angry sia...he still got the guts to talk about nabi to me..i fark him back ar...then he was out of words..but we have been frens for 4 years..no point for us to fight...so i settle everything wif him..n tings is back to normal...i really wash his brains out sia..gd for him..hope he'll change...i don hold any grudgeS against him..i told him tat he has a split personality..he is way diff whe he's wif his frens and wif iR...I toLD him..tat i want him to treat gerls wif respect..esp when comes to iR...Mickey..u better change for the better ya...i really loose trust on him sia..i tot he is the guy tat would make my sister happy...but wat sia..this ting happen...i told him not to make iR shed a tear...he said he cant control his temper n feeling of jealousy towards iR...he oso donoe why..but watever it is...i gave him a piece of advice...and he promise to try and change...TATS GD... aND wAt MAKeS it SUckIer Is...BcoZ of AZMIL!!!!!!!!!!!!ARGHH!!!!!!!!!!! I CANT STAND HIM SIA....why ar guys ar like tis...make my life so miserable..feel like slapping his face sia...but wat the heck..fark ar...i dun care ar...do watever he wanna do..he want to scold me..scold ar...i dun care...he talk mepekzz onie...i give him one tight slap ar...make him wake up!!!! k la2..gtg..nak sms ngan iR...LAGI BESH!!!!!BYEZZ.....
